TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A beta-glucan (a type of polysaccharide) from the mushroom Lentinus edodes (shiitake mushroom). It has been studied in Japan as a treatment for cancer.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Beta-glucano (tipo de polisacárido) del hongo Lentinus edodes (hongo shiitake). Se ha estudiado en el Japón como tratamiento contra el cáncer.
